nodes.text: Gordarl Weaponsmiths were a weapons manufacturing company which produced the Geonosian sonic blaster a model of sonic blaster and the LR1K sonic cannon, used by the Geonosian species of the planet Geonosis.

Gordarl Weaponsmiths was first mentioned in The New Essential Guide to Weapons and Technology, a Star Wars Legends reference book written by W. Haden Blackman and released in 2004. It was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
